about_the_game:
Welcome to Dusty Springs, a small country town in Australia with a vibrant bogan community. The quiet life of this humble town is thrown into chaos when a nearby opal mine unearths mysterious opals that release spirits, causing strange mutations and anomalies across the land.

A large corporation known as Drill and Thrill seizes the opportunity to exploit the valuable opals, taking over the mine and rapidly expanding their operations. However, as the anomalies worsen, the company shifts the blame onto the bogans of Dusty Springs, inciting fear and suspicion. The town is unjustly placed under strict lockdown, trapping its residents and cutting off their supplies.

Our unlikely hero, Davo, is a quintessential bogan who loves nothing more than enjoying a cold beer at his local pub. With the lockdown in place, his beloved pub is forced to close, depriving Davo and his mates of their cherished pastime. This ignites a fire within Davo to take action.

Embark on an epic quest with Davo as he sets out to uncover the truth behind the anomalies, confront the powerful forces of Drill and Thrill, and ultimately save his town and country from this unnatural disaster. With his unique bogan charm, quick wit, and determination, Davo proves that even the most unexpected hero can rise to the occasion.

Key Features:

Exploration: Traverse through diverse Australian landscapes, from dusty outback towns to eerie opal mines and beyond.
Combat: Engage in challenging battles against mutated creatures and Drill and Thrill's security forces.
Abilities: Discover and master unique abilities as you progress, unlocking new areas and secrets.
Humor: Enjoy a storyline filled with Aussie humor and cultural references, adding a light-hearted touch to the adventure.
Join Davo in "Aussie Bogan Hero" and show the world that even a bogan can become a hero!

name: Aussie Bogan Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: None
